p: The comparative FTIR analysis of the spectra of extracts and AuNPs reveals the same functional groups (O-H, C = O, and C-O) [ 206, 210], that were attributed to some phenolic acids and flavonoids present in Artemisia extracts (chlorogenic acid, caffeic acid, rutin, tannic acid, salicylic acid, ascorbic acid, 2,5-dihydroxybenzoic acid, ethyl p-anisate, niacin), but also N-H bonds [ 210]. Therefore, such compounds are responsible for the reduction process and can be adsorbed/complexed on the surface of AuNPs [ 201].
